author: Dipanjan Roy Chaudhury and Ishani Duttagupta
title: Diaspora urged to aid stranded Indians
description: Diaspora urged to aid stranded IndiansIndian diplomatic missions across continents are reaching out to various influential Indians to support those stranded in respective countries, ET has learnt. It is no secret that the Indian community has emerged as influ…
content: New Delhi: With thousands of Indians stuck in different parts of the world following the travel restrictions imposed by India and lockdown situation in several countries to contain Covid-19, Delhi is reaching out to influential members of the Indian community… [+3951 chars]
